Detailed Description

Format of the AckTransferData Command Payload. See ZigBee Smart Energy Profile Specification r17, Figure D.42.

Definition at line 569 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

Field Documentation

uint16_t _ZclAckTransferDataPayload_t::tunnelId

A number between 0..65535 that uniquely identifies the tunnel that has been allocated in the server.

Definition at line 573 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

uint16_t _ZclAckTransferDataPayload_t::numberOfBytesLeft

Indicates the number of bytes that may still be received by the initiator of this command (receiver). See ZSE Profile Spec. r17, D.6.2.4.5.2, page 280.

Definition at line 577 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.
